message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a unique and high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $150?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $175. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm still looking to keep my expenses low. Could we possibly agree on $160?

Hi Bob, I see you're really interested in the product, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $165, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product!
I appreciate your offer, Alice. After considering the value of the product, I believe $160 is a fair price for both of us. Could we please agree on this amount?
